name: Tentacle Monster
description:
I saw a cool tutorial and made a thing out of it so you don't have to!

Noa of Blacktornprod made this tentacle monsters tutorial based on Owen Senior's code.

I made a thing out of it!

I am going to give it to you for free!

If you want a tentacle monster to follow your mouse or any other object in the game screen just download it and use it as you like.

Download For Free here

Try it out and download it for free!

Noah's video if you want to try to make it yourself

Owens twitter if you want to connect with the guy whose idea this is.
